data.name: Blackjack
data.description:
Play SUPER FAST real-time MULTIPLAYER Blackjack now to improve your skills, gain experience, make new FRIENDS.

With Blackjack, you now have the famous gambling game always with you - for free and online. Play Blackjack like a pro. Adapt the rules, train your skills and become a blackjack pro yourself!

♦️ 10,000 FREE CHIPS ON SIGN-UP.
♠️ 1000 FREE CHIPS EVERY 12 HOURS.
♥️ VOICE CHAT – Live voice chat with gamers all over the world.
♣️ AVATARS – To personalize your in-game look.

Blackjack is a free online game of chance and skill for entertainment purposes only. It is not possible to win real money, real items/services/gifts or goods in kind by playing our skill games. The virtual currencies used in this game are called Chips, and they can be purchased in the ‘Store’ with real money. Chips cannot be exchanged for cash or be paid out in any form and can only be used to play our game. Blackjack is intended solely for an adult audience - gamers aged eighteen years or over.

changelog.change_log:
Feature Improvements:
- Introduced full-body Meta Avatars for increased social presence and enhanced VR immersion.

Known Issues:
- New players might have to restart their game in order for voice chat to work after giving microphone permission.

Feature Improvements:
- Introduced 777 classic slots machine and daily rewards.
- Some changes in meta.

Known Issues:
- New players might have to restart their game in order for voice chat to work after giving microphone permission.

Feature Improvements:
- Introduced new card designs in store which can be bought with chips.

Known Issues:
- New players might have to restart their game in order for voice chat to work after giving microphone permission.

Feature Improvements:
- Introduced an in-game store to buy new card designs and chips.

Known Issues:
- New players might have to restart their game in order for voice chat to work after giving microphone permission.

Feature Improvements:
- Fixed a bug in which player bet was causing a match crash.

Known Issues:
- New players might have to restart their game in order for voice chat to work after giving microphone permission.

Feature Improvements:
- Players can now split if two same cards are dealt.
- Players can access the in-game browser for streaming music and web surfing.
- Added the settings menu for controlling background, SFX, and browser volume.

Known Issues:
- New players might have to restart their game in order for voice chat to work after giving microphone permission.

Feature Improvement:

- Bug fixed in which players were able to teleport out of the map.
- Players now get notified whenever other player accept your friend request.
- Each player on table now get their cards dealt one by one.

Known Issues:
- New players might have to restart their game in order for voice chat to work after giving microphone permission.

- Bug fixed in which players weren't able to see opponent's chips in bet area.
- Players now get notified whenever a friend comes online.
- Players can now join their friends at a table via friends menu.
- Gameplay improvement.

Known Issues:

- General performance improvements and gameplay bug fixes.
